messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sandra's stories was Pornography and teens
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/18/03 3:25:54 PM, GDobes@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/18/03 3:25:54 PM, GDobes@... writes:

<< Did you know that you attended the unschooling group
at Shyrley's last week; so did Joyce? >>

Maybe that's why I was so out of it here!! <g>

(My ankle starts to swell and hurt at some point each day, and I just veg out
with it up for a while...)

Thanks for the reassurance that I wasn't traumatizing EVERYBODY with my
candid outpourings.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sandra's stories was Pornography and teens
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ahhhhhhh, it was them what ate all the cookies ;-) Shyrley
messages.messageBody:
GDobes@... wrote:

> In a message dated 01/18/2003 11:35:06 AM Eastern Standard Time,
> kellitraas@... writes:
>
> > **Sometimes when I write those things so plainly I worry that I'll
> > cause more damage than good in some families. But since things ARE going
> > so
> > well with my boys (and I hope it stays that way) it seems worth continuing
> > to
> > share. **
> >
> >
> > Sandra,
> >
> > Please keep writing these stories, they are so helpful. I know I've
> > said it before but it bears repeating.
>
> Sandra,
> I'll second this. Did you know that you attended the unschooling group
> at Shyrley's last week; so did Joyce? We were so glad you were there. Since
> I've been part of this email group, I have benefited from your
> stories/advice. I know everyone attending the ungroup feels the same.
>
> Ginny
>

Ahhhhhhh, it was them what ate all the cookies ;-)

Shyrley
